content.stem:
How has consumer demand for sustainable clothing impacted companies? Use at least two details from the text to support your answer.

 

Type your answer in the space provided.

rubric.name: Rubric 2
rubric.val:
A two-point response includes at least two details from the text that support the student’s explanation for how consumer demand for sustainable clothing has impacted companies.

 

  • Companies start to use organic cotton/no pesticides or chemicals.

  • Companies use natural fibers that require less water than cotton, such as bamboo or hemp.

  • Companies use natural fibers, such as wool, silk, jute, corn, flax, and soy.

  • Companies produce synthetic, petroleum-based fabrics/polyester/nylon in more sustainable ways by using recycled materials.

  • Companies ensure farmers and workers work in safe and fair workplaces.

  • Smaller companies produce clothes in a sustainable way and market their eco-friendliness to consumers.• Smaller companies can get the attention of larger brands if successful with producing clothes in a sustainable way.

sample.name: 2-Point Other Official Sample Answers
sample.samplecontent: The consumer demand for sustainable clothing has impacted companies in many ways. One of those ways is that companies are starting to use organic cotton or natural fibers. Another way is that some companies are producing polyester and nylon by using recycled materials.

rubric.name: Rubric 1
rubric.val: A one-point response includes one detail from the text that supports the student’s explanation for how consumer demand for sustainable clothing has impacted companies.

sample.name: 1-Point Official Sample Answer
sample.samplecontent: The consumer demand for sustainable clothing has impacted companies to make clothing using natural fibers. Natural fibers use less water than cotton.

rubric.name: Rubric 0
rubric.val: A response that does not provide any detail from the text that supports the student’s explanation of how consumer demand for sustainable clothing has impacted companies receives no credit.

sample.name: 0-Point Official Sample Answer
sample.samplecontent: Consumers change the clothing industry by writing to their congressmen and manufacturers about the companies’ practices.
